fail.name: Frightened

hit.text: When you hit a creature with a weapon with the neuralizing property, you can force it to make a Wisdom saving throw, DC equal to the neuralizing number. On a failed save, the creature takes an additional 1d4 psychic damage and becomes frightened of you until the start of its next turn.
hit.title: Neuralizing

fail.name: Shocked
fail.desc:
A shocked creature can’t take reactions.
 - On its turn, a shocked creature can take either an action or a bonus action, but not both.

fail.name: Deafened
fail.desc: A deafened creature can’t hear and automatically fails any ability check that requires hearing.

hit.text: When you hit a creature with a weapon with the shocking property, you can force it to make a Dexterity saving throw, DC equal to the shocking number. On a failed save, the creature takes an additional 1d4 lightning damage and becomes shocked until the end of its next turn.
hit.title: Shocking

hit.text: When you hit a creature with a weapon with the sonorous property, you can force it to make a Constitution saving throw, DC equal to the sonorous number. On a failed save, the creature takes an additional 1d4 sonic damage and becomes deafened until the end of its next turn.
hit.title: Sonorous
